about_the_game:
A terrible enemy emerged from the darkness with a powerful spell that changed everything forever.
When chaos arose, the sky began to be covered with ash and your destiny had already marked your path.
Collect, craft, explore, defeat powerful enemies, forge your own weapons, customize your equipment, complete dungeons, solve puzzles and dominate the terrain in this grand open world RPG focused on a retro yet innovative experience.

Will you be able to overthrow Team Prism and their leader?
What ending will you meet? Your decisions are important!


Despite everything, a mysterious force hides between this game and reality...
If it comes to contacting you, god have mercy.
